faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for EECS1022 and what kind of prof are they? Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for EECS1022? faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS2021? How is Hamzeh Roumani's grading if I want to get a high grade in EECS2021? Are his test very tricky and can I expect fair labs? faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS1022? Should I take Hamzeh Roumani's EECS1022 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Should I attend EECS1022 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani? Does Hamzeh Roumani explain EECS1022 well?

His second lab test was nothing like the first one and he gave barely enough time.

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for EECS2021 and what kind of prof are they? How is Hamzeh Roumani's grading if I want to get a high grade in EECS2021? Are his test very tricky and can I expect fair labs? Does Hamzeh Roumani explain EECS2021 well?

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS1022? Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for EECS1022? Should I attend EECS1022 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani?
faq.answer: He's the best prof I've had so far at York. If you can, get him! I felt sick a couple of times and he had no issue with moving my test to another day. Best lecturer so far and very motivational. He is very easy to talk to and he genuinely cares about students.

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS1022?
faq.answer: He is tough but clear, very knowledge, work hard & definitely will succeed very helpful and tough, best prof for computer science at york so far.

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for CSE4413 and what kind of prof are they? Should I attend CSE4413 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani? Does Hamzeh Roumani explain CSE4413 well? Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for CSE4413?

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS4413?

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS1020? Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for EECS1020? Should I attend EECS1020 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani?

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for EECS1022 and what kind of prof are they? Should I take Hamzeh Roumani's EECS1022 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Is attending EECS1022 lecture from Hamzeh Roumani worth it to pass the class?

The course itself is new so it was a bit disjointed between the lectures and labs which probably made the in class tests harder than they needed to be. The lab component made up for it by being really easy.

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for EECS1020?

faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for CSE2021? Is attending CSE2021 lecture from Hamzeh Roumani worth it to pass the class? Does Hamzeh Roumani explain CSE2021 well?
faq.answer: I skipped most CS courses because the profs usually simply regurgitate what you can read in a textbook. Roumani  was  one of the only profs who used the class for interaction and put some effort into teaching topics in an interesting and concise manner. You probably could pass without coming to class, but it was still definitely worth coming to.

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for EECS1020 and what kind of prof are they?
faq.answer: Best professor I have ever had. He is  concise, will give great examples and offers interesting tidbits to keep you interested in the course and program. faq.question: Is Hamzeh Roumani a nice professor for EECS1020?
faq.answer: He is THE BEST. Would love to take courses taught by him as many as possible!

faq.question: Should I attend CSE1020 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani? Is Hamzeh Roumani giving good grades for CSE1020?

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Hamzeh Roumani's class for CSE1020 and what kind of prof are they? Should I take Hamzeh Roumani's CSE1020 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Should I attend CSE1020 lectures with Hamzeh Roumani?

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds a nice professor for EECS3101? Does Jeff Edmonds explain EECS3101 well?
faq.answer: Jeff is the best professor I've had so far at York. But I wish he discussed the topics using more general terms than his own e.g. fairy god mother, little birds etc.

faq.question: Should I take Jeff Edmonds's EECS3101 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Should I attend EECS3101 lectures with Jeff Edmonds?
faq.answer: Jeff's a really interesting guy with a unique style. You might find some of his ideas hard to map (fairy god mothers aren't usually an interview answer) but the steps work everywhere. Always the steps. He can get hard to follow but he tries, and he records lectures. Participation grades are weird, final is a killer (seriously), tests are fair.

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds a nice professor for EECS3101?
faq.answer: Jeff is one the best Professor at York.

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds a nice professor for CSE2001? Should I take Jeff Edmonds's CSE2001 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Does Jeff Edmonds explain CSE2001 well?
faq.answer: Great Proff! He cares about the students, will always answer questions. He has his own way of explaining concepts which you have to understand. Doesn't regrade for tests and if he does he will regrade your whole test and may lower the grade. For the tests make sure he shows you step by step how to answer the questions (ie reductions and proofs).

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds giving good grades for EECS3101? Is attending EECS3101 lecture from Jeff Edmonds worth it to pass the class? Does Jeff Edmonds explain EECS3101 well?
faq.answer: Follow his methodology and you should do ok. Read his lecture notes and listen to him when he does his examples in class. Ask him questions. Hes a pretty funny guy. Also go to his tutorials! He does all his examples in them and goes over them so many times. His style is unusual but just put in some work and you will pass!

faq.question: Should I attend EECS2001 lectures with Jeff Edmonds? Does Jeff Edmonds explain EECS2001 well?
faq.answer: Cares about his students and WANTS them to succeed and understand. Incredibly patient and casual. Fun classes. His slides are comprehensive so they can be a bit overwhelming. Don't hesitate to ask questions thoughhe's willing to help.

faq.question: Does Jeff Edmonds explain EECS3101 well?
faq.answer: You have to know his learning methods you can't use the methods use from Google otherwise you will get the question wrong and it's hard to apply his steps for interview questions

faq.question: Should I attend EECS3101 lectures with Jeff Edmonds?
faq.answer: Jeff teaches material in an abstract way such that you can apply these concepts to more general problems. You will first (and may continue to) find the way he lectures confusing but eventually (hopefully) you will find yourself understanding the material once understanding his teaching style.

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds giving good grades for CSE2001? Should I attend CSE2001 lectures with Jeff Edmonds? Does Jeff Edmonds explain CSE2001 well?
faq.answer: Firstly, 2001 is a hard course. It's 100% theoretical and abstract. Just remember that when you take the course. Now, when you have course material that's super hard, it helps to have a professor who teaches well. Jeff is super patient, answers literally 2 dozen questions every class, and wants everyone to pass. He makes the course bearable.

faq.question: Is Jeff Edmonds a nice professor for EECS2001?
faq.answer: THE BEST PROF AT YORK, HANDS DOWN!!!!

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Jeff Edmonds's class for EECS2001 and what kind of prof are they? Is Jeff Edmonds giving good grades for EECS2001?
faq.answer: Jeff is an amazing teacher who really cares about the students and even asks specifically if you understand the concept and want everyone to pass the course or get a good mark. He is the as best as they come.

faq.question: Should I attend EECS2001 lectures with Jeff Edmonds?

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Burton Ma's class for EECS2030 and what kind of prof are they? Should I take Burton Ma's EECS2030 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Does Burton Ma explain EECS2030 well? Will I need to study a lot for EECS2030 with Burton Ma?

faq.question: Is Burton Ma a nice professor for EECS2030? Should I take Burton Ma's EECS2030 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Is attending EECS2030 lecture from Burton Ma worth it to pass the class? Does Burton Ma explain EECS2030 well?

faq.question: Should I take Burton Ma's EECS2030 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Should I attend EECS2030 lectures with Burton Ma? Will I need to study a lot for EECS2030 with Burton Ma?

faq.question: Is Burton Ma a nice professor for LEEECS1011?

faq.question: Should I attend EECS3000 lectures with Peter Cribb?
faq.answer: Essays are hard. Lectures are skeleton-like and expect too much participation from students. Lecture slides are useless. Massive curving though.

faq.question: Is Peter Cribb a nice professor for EECS3000? Is Peter Cribb giving good grades for EECS3000?
faq.answer: He's generally a pretty nice guy, but the way he grades students for their contributions to the course makes it feel like he's just trying to kill their motivation to actually complete it. By the way, I hope you're mentally prepared to write essays on some of the mundane stuff imaginable. Definitely wouldn't take a course with him again.

faq.question: Is Peter Cribb a nice professor for EECS3000? Is attending EECS3000 lecture from Peter Cribb worth it to pass the class? Does Peter Cribb explain EECS3000 well?

faq.question: Should I attend CS3000 lectures with Peter Cribb? Does Peter Cribb explain CS3000 well?

faq.question: Is Peter Cribb a nice professor for COS101? Should I attend COS101 lectures with Peter Cribb?

faq.question: Is Peter Cribb a nice professor for CSE3000? Is Peter Cribb giving good grades for CSE3000?

faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Peter Cribb's class for CSE3000 and what kind of prof are they? Should I attend CSE3000 lectures with Peter Cribb?

faq.question: Will I need to study a lot for CSE3000 with Peter Cribb?

faq.question: Should I attend CSE3 lectures with Peter Cribb?

faq.question: Is attending EECS1028 lecture from Suprakash Datta worth it to pass the class? Does Suprakash Datta explain EECS1028 well?
faq.answer: Prof Datta is Overall a solid guy. The class is tough, but if you attend most of his lectures and keep up in the textbook there's no question you wont do well in the class. faq.question: Will I enjoy taking Suprakash Datta's class for EECS3214 and what kind of prof are they? Should I attend EECS3214 lectures with Suprakash Datta? Does Suprakash Datta explain EECS3214 well? How much time is spent studying for assignments and homework for EECS3214 with Suprakash Datta?
faq.answer: Great Professor who genuinely cares about the students and the program. Lectures are informative and follows the slides and book closely. You MUST study from the book and not (primarily) the slides. Questions are open ended (This is a good thing; too much detail for brute memorization) and assignments are fair.

faq.question: Does Suprakash Datta explain EECS3214 well? Will I need to study a lot for EECS3214 with Suprakash Datta?
faq.answer: his exam questions are far too ambiguous and open. Instead of putting questions from important parts of chapter, his questions are unknown as something too specific as a diagram or summary of entire section in a question and with so long powerpoint videos!!!! for the first time i am looking at such dense notes so it confuses as how deep to study .

faq.question: Should I take Suprakash Datta's EECS3214 class if I care about my grades and GPA? Is attending EECS3214 lecture from Suprakash Datta worth it to pass the class? Will I need to study a lot for EECS3214 with Suprakash Datta?

Try to listen to him in class even though you might be fighting the need to drift off into a deep sleep.

faq.question: Should I attend EECS3214 lectures with Suprakash Datta? Does Suprakash Datta explain EECS3214 well? Will I need to study a lot for EECS3214 with Suprakash Datta?
faq.answer: Very fair prof. Love his midterm and exam. A lot of questions have multiple solutions. If you can give something creative within the theory discussed in class you usually get full marks. Doesn't make you memorize anything, just wants to see you understand what's going on. Assignments are easy. Guaranteed credit with an honest effort.

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS2011? Is Suprakash Datta giving good grades for EECS2011? Is attending EECS2011 lecture from Suprakash Datta worth it to pass the class? Will I need to study a lot for EECS2011 with Suprakash Datta?
faq.answer: Lectures were pretty good. Lecture slides could've been better, but if you read the slides from other sections/years along with his, you could skip using the textbook. Assignments/tests/exam were common with James Elder's section and were fair and gave plenty of bonuses.

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS2011? Is Suprakash Datta giving good grades for EECS2011? Should I attend EECS2011 lectures with Suprakash Datta? Will I need to study a lot for EECS2011 with Suprakash Datta?

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS3101?

Plus if you actually talk to him he has good stories/life advice.

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS1028? Is Suprakash Datta giving good grades for EECS1028?

faq.question: Will I need to study a lot for EECS1028 with Suprakash Datta?

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta giving good grades for EECS3214? Does Suprakash Datta explain EECS3214 well?

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS1028? Is Suprakash Datta giving good grades for EECS1028? Should I attend EECS1028 lectures with Suprakash Datta? Will I need to study a lot for EECS1028 with Suprakash Datta?

faq.question: Is Suprakash Datta a nice professor for EECS3214? Should I attend EECS3214 lectures with Suprakash Datta? Will I need to study a lot for EECS3214 with Suprakash Datta?
